00009   template<class T> void idx_clear(Idx<T> &inp) {
00010     IdxIter<T> pinp;
00011     idx_aloop1_on(pinp,inp) { *pinp = 0; }
00012   }
00013 
00014   template<class T> void idx_fill(Idx<T> &inp, T v) {
00015     IdxIter<T> pinp;
00016     idx_aloop1_on(pinp,inp) { *pinp = v; }
00017   }
00018 
00019   template<class T> void idx_minus(Idx<T> &inp, Idx<T> &out) {
00020     IdxIter<T> pinp; IdxIter<T> pout;
00021     idx_aloop2_on(pinp,inp,pout,out) { *pout = - *pinp; }
00022   }
00023 
00024   template<class T> void idx_inv(Idx<T> &inp, Idx<T> &out) {
00025     IdxIter<T> pinp; IdxIter<T> pout;
00026     idx_aloop2_on(pinp,inp,pout,out) { *pout = 1 / *pinp; }
00027   }

00029   template<class T> void idx_sub(Idx<T> &i1, Idx<T> &i2, Idx<T> &out) {
00030     IdxIter<T> pi1, pi2; IdxIter<T> pout;
00031     idx_aloop3_on(pi1,i1,pi2,i2,pout,out) { *pout = *pi1 - *pi2; }
00032   }
00033 
00034   template<class T> void idx_add(Idx<T> &i1, Idx<T> &i2, Idx<T> &out) {
00035     IdxIter<T> pi1, pi2; IdxIter<T> pout;
00036     idx_aloop3_on(pi1,i1,pi2,i2,pout,out) { *pout = *pi1 + *pi2; }
00037   }

00039   template<class T> void idx_mul(Idx<T> &i1, Idx<T> &i2, Idx<T> &out) {
00040     IdxIter<T> pi1, pi2; IdxIter<T> pout;
00041     idx_aloop3_on(pi1,i1,pi2,i2,pout,out) { *pout = (*pi1) * (*pi2); }
00042   }

00044   template<class T> void idx_addc(Idx<T> &inp, T c, Idx<T> &out) {
00045     IdxIter<T> pinp; IdxIter<T> pout;
00046     idx_aloop2_on(pinp,inp,pout,out) { *pout = *pinp + c; }
00047   }
00048 
00049   template<class T> void idx_addc_bounded(Idx<T> &inp, T c, Idx<T> &out) {
00050     IdxIter<T> pinp; IdxIter<T> pout; double val;
00051     idx_aloop2_on(pinp,inp,pout,out) { 
00052       val = *pinp + c;
00053       // prevent under and overflow
00054       *pout = MAX(std::numeric_limits<T>::min(), 
00055                   MIN(std::numeric_limits<T>::max(), val));
00056     }
00057   }
00058 
00059   template<class T> void idx_subc_bounded(Idx<T> &inp, T c, Idx<T> &out) {
00060     IdxIter<T> pinp; IdxIter<T> pout; double val;
00061     idx_aloop2_on(pinp,inp,pout,out) { 
00062       val = *pinp - c;
00063       // prevent under and overflow
00064       *pout = MAX(std::numeric_limits<T>::min(), 
00065                   MIN(std::numeric_limits<T>::max(), val));
00066     }
00067   }

00104   template<class T> void idx_subsquare(Idx<T> &i1, Idx<T> &i2, Idx<T> &out) {
00105     IdxIter<T> pi1; IdxIter<T> pi2; IdxIter<T> pout;
00106     idx_aloop3_on(pi1,i1,pi2,i2,pout,out) { T d = *pi1 - *pi2; *pout += d*d; }
00107   }

00110   template<class T> void idx_lincomb(Idx<T> &i1, T k1, Idx<T> &i2, T k2, 
00111                                      Idx<T> &out) {
00112     IdxIter<T> pi1; IdxIter<T> pi2; IdxIter<T> pout;
00113     idx_aloop3_on(pi1,i1,pi2,i2,pout,out) { *pout =  k1*(*pi1) + k2*(*pi2); }

00141   // there is a much faster and parallel way
00142   // of doing this using a tree.
00143   template<class T> T idx_sum(Idx<T> &inp, T *out) {
00144     T z = 0;
00145     IdxIter<T> pinp;
00146     idx_aloop1_on(pinp,inp) { z += *pinp; }
00147     if (out != NULL) {
00148       *out += z;
00149       return *out;
00150     }
00151     return z;
00152   }
00153 
00154   // there is a much faster and parallel way
00155   // of doing this using a tree.
00156   template<class T> T idx_sumsqr(Idx<T> &inp) {
00157     T z = 0;
00158     IdxIter<T> pinp;
00159     idx_aloop1_on(pinp,inp) { z += (*pinp)*(*pinp); }
00160     return z;
00161   }

00269   template<class T> T idx_sum(Idx<T> &inp, T *out) {
00270     T z = 0;
00271     ScalarIter<T> pinp(inp);
00272     idx_aloop1_on(pinp,inp) { z += *pinp; }
00273     if (out != NULL) {
00274       *out += z;
00275       return *out;
00276     }
00277     return z;
00278   }

00280   // there is a much faster and parallel way
00281   // of doing this using a tree.
00282   template<class T> T idx_sumsqr(Idx<T> &inp) {
00283     T z = 0;
00284     ScalarIter<T> pinp(inp);
00285     idx_aloop1_on(pinp,inp) { z += (*pinp)*(*pinp); }
00286     return z;
00287   }

00291   // generic copy for two different types.
00292   //template<class T1, class T2> void idx_copy(Idx<T1> &src, Idx<T2> &dst) {

00300   //template<class T1, class T2> void idx_copy(Idx<T1> &src, Idx<T2> &dst) {
00304   //  {idx_aloop2(isrc, src, T1, idst, dst, T2) { *idst = (T2)(*isrc); }}
00305   //}
00306 
00307   template<class T1, class T2> void idx_copy(Idx<T1> &src, Idx<T2> &dst){
00308     idx_aloop2(isrc, src, T1, idst, dst, T2) { *idst = (T2)(*isrc); }
00309   }
00310 
00311   template<class T1, class T2> void idx_copy_clip(Idx<T1> &src, Idx<T2> &dst){
00312     idx_aloop2(isrc, src, T1, idst, dst, T2) { 
00313       *idst = (T2) MAX(std::numeric_limits<T2>::min(), 
00314                        MIN(std::numeric_limits<T2>::max(), *isrc));
00315     }
00316   }
00317 
00318   // generic copy for the same type.
00319   template<class T> void idx_copy(Idx<T> &src, Idx<T> &dst) {
00320     intg N1=src.nelements();
00321     intg N2 =dst.nelements();
00322     if (N1 != N2) { ylerror("idx_op: Idxs have different number of elements\n"); }
00323     if ( (src.order() == 0) && (dst.order() == 0) ) {
00324       *(dst.idx_ptr()) = *(src.idx_ptr());
00325     } else if ( src.contiguousp() && dst.contiguousp() ) {
00326       /* they are both contiguous: call the stride 1 routine */
00327       memcpy(dst.idx_ptr(), src.idx_ptr(), N1 * sizeof(T));
00328     } else {
00329       // else, they don't have the same structure: do it "by hand". This is slower
00330       {idx_aloop2(isrc, src, T, idst, dst, T) { *idst = *isrc; }}
00331     }
00332   }
00333 
00335   // Functions without iterators
00336 
00337   template<class T> T idx_sumacc(Idx<T> &inp, Idx<T> &acc) {
00338     // acc must be of order 0.
00339     if (acc.order() != 0)
00340       ylerror("expecting an Idx0 as output");
00341     return idx_sum(inp, acc.ptr());
00342   }
00343 
00344   template<class T> void rev_idx2 (Idx<T> &m) {
00345     if (m.order() != 2)
00346       ylerror("Expecting Idx of order 2");
00347     T tmp, *p = m.ptr();
00348     intg size = m.dim(0) * m.dim(1);
00349     intg i;
00350 
00351     for (i = 0; i < size/2; i++) {
00352       tmp = p[i];
00353       p[i] = p[size-i-1];
00354       p[size-i-1] = tmp;
00355     }
00356   }
00357 
00358   template<class T> void rev_idx2_tr (Idx<T> &m, Idx<T> &n) {
00359     if ((m.order() != 2) || (n.order() != 2))
00360       ylerror("Expecting Idx of order 2");
00361     T *p = m.ptr();
00362     T *q = n.ptr();
00363     intg size = m.dim(0) * m.dim(1);
00364     intg i;
00365 
00366     for (i=0; i < size; i++) {
00367       q[i] = p[size-i-1];
00368     }
00369   }
00370 
00371   // TODO-0 write specialized blas version in cpp
00372   template<class T> void idx_m4dotm2(Idx<T> &i1, Idx<T> &i2, Idx<T> &o1) {
00373     idx_checkorder3(i1, 4, i2, 2, o1, 2); // check for compatible orders
00374     if ((i1.dim(0) != o1.dim(0)) || (i1.dim(1) != o1.dim(1)) 
00375         || (i1.dim(2) != i2.dim(0)) || (i1.dim(3) != i2.dim(1)))
00376       ylerror("incompatible dimensions");
00377     T *c1, *c1_2;
00378     T *c2, *c2_0;
00379     T *c1_0, *c1_1;
00380     T *ker;
00381     intg c1_m2 = (i1).mod(2), c2_m0 = (i2).mod(0);
00382     intg c1_m3 = (i1).mod(3), c2_m1 = (i2).mod(1);
00383     intg k,l, kmax = (i2).dim(0), lmax = (i2).dim(1);
00384     T *d1_0, *d1, f;
00385     intg c1_m0 = (i1).mod(0), d1_m0 = (o1).mod(0);
00386     intg c1_m1 = (i1).mod(1), d1_m1 = (o1).mod(1);
00387     intg i,j, imax = (o1).dim(0), jmax = (o1).dim(1);
00388     c1_0 = i1.idx_ptr();
00389     ker = i2.idx_ptr();
00390     d1_0 = o1.idx_ptr();
00391     for (i=0; i<imax; i++) {
00392       c1_1 = c1_0;
00393       d1 = d1_0;
00394       for (j=0; j<jmax; j++) {
00395         f = 0;
00396         c1_2 = c1_1;
00397         c2_0 = ker;
00398         for (k=0; k<kmax; k++) {
00399           c1 = c1_2;
00400           c2 = c2_0;
00401           for (l=0; l<lmax; l++) {
00402             f += (*c1)*(*c2);
00403             c1 += c1_m3;
00404             c2 += c2_m1;
00405           }
00406           c1_2 += c1_m2;
00407           c2_0 += c2_m0;
00408         }
00409         *d1 = f;
00410         d1 += d1_m1;
00411         c1_1 += c1_m1;
00412       }
00413       d1_0 += d1_m0;
00414       c1_0 += c1_m0;
00415     }
00416   }
00417 
00418   // TODO-0 write specialized blas version in cpp
00419   template<class T> void idx_m4dotm2acc(Idx<T> &i1, Idx<T> &i2, Idx<T> &o1) {
00420     idx_checkorder3(i1, 4, i2, 2, o1, 2); // check for compatible orders
00421     if ((i1.dim(0) != o1.dim(0)) || (i1.dim(1) != o1.dim(1)) 
00422         || (i1.dim(2) != i2.dim(0)) || (i1.dim(3) != i2.dim(1)))
00423       ylerror("incompatible dimensions");
00424     T *c1, *c1_2;
00425     T *c2, *c2_0;
00426     T *c1_0, *c1_1;
00427     T *ker;
00428     intg c1_m2 = (i1).mod(2), c2_m0 = (i2).mod(0);
00429     intg c1_m3 = (i1).mod(3), c2_m1 = (i2).mod(1);
00430     intg k,l, kmax = (i2).dim(0), lmax = (i2).dim(1);
00431     T *d1_0, *d1, f;
00432     intg c1_m0 = (i1).mod(0), d1_m0 = (o1).mod(0);
00433     intg c1_m1 = (i1).mod(1), d1_m1 = (o1).mod(1);
00434     intg i,j, imax = (o1).dim(0), jmax = (o1).dim(1);
00435     c1_0 = i1.idx_ptr();
00436     ker = i2.idx_ptr();
00437     d1_0 = o1.idx_ptr();
00438     for (i=0; i<imax; i++) {
00439       c1_1 = c1_0;
00440       d1 = d1_0;
00441       for (j=0; j<jmax; j++) {
00442         f = *d1;
00443         c1_2 = c1_1;
00444         c2_0 = ker;
00445         for (k=0; k<kmax; k++) {
00446           c1 = c1_2;
00447           c2 = c2_0;
00448           for (l=0; l<lmax; l++) {
00449             f += (*c1)*(*c2);
00450             c1 += c1_m3;
00451             c2 += c2_m1;
00452           }
00453           c1_2 += c1_m2;
00454           c2_0 += c2_m0;
00455         }
00456         *d1 = f;
00457         d1 += d1_m1;
00458         c1_1 += c1_m1;
00459       }
00460       d1_0 += d1_m0;
00461       c1_0 += c1_m0;
00462     }
00463   }
00464 
00465   template<class T> void idx_m4squdotm2acc(Idx<T> &i1, Idx<T> &i2, Idx<T> &o1) {
00466     idx_checkorder3(i1, 4, i2, 2, o1, 2);
00467     T *c1, *c1_2;
00468     T *c2, *c2_0;
00469     T *c1_0, *c1_1;
00470     T *ker;
00471     intg c1_m2 = (i1).mod(2), c2_m0 = (i2).mod(0);
00472     intg c1_m3 = (i1).mod(3), c2_m1 = (i2).mod(1);
00473     intg k,l, kmax = (i2).dim(0), lmax = (i2).dim(1);
00474     T *d1_0, *d1, f;
00475     intg c1_m0 = (i1).mod(0), d1_m0 = (o1).mod(0);
00476     intg c1_m1 = (i1).mod(1), d1_m1 = (o1).mod(1);
00477     intg i,j, imax = (o1).dim(0), jmax = (o1).dim(1);
00478     c1_0 = i1.idx_ptr();
00479     ker = i2.idx_ptr();
00480     d1_0 = o1.idx_ptr();
00481     for (i=0; i<imax; i++) {
00482       c1_1 = c1_0;
00483       d1 = d1_0;
00484       for (j=0; j<jmax; j++) {
00485         f = *d1;
00486         c1_2 = c1_1;
00487         c2_0 = ker;
00488         for (k=0; k<kmax; k++) {
00489           c1 = c1_2;
00490           c2 = c2_0;
00491           for (l=0; l<lmax; l++) {
00492             f += (*c1)*(*c1)*(*c2);
00493             c1 += c1_m3;
00494             c2 += c2_m1;
00495           }
00496           c1_2 += c1_m2;
00497           c2_0 += c2_m0;
00498         }
00499         *d1 = f;
00500         d1 += d1_m1;
00501         c1_1 += c1_m1;
00502       }
00503       d1_0 += d1_m0;
00504       c1_0 += c1_m0;
00505     }
00506   }
00507 
00508   template<class T> void idx_m2extm2(Idx<T> &i1, Idx<T> &i2, Idx<T> &o1) {
00509     idx_checkorder3(i1, 2, i2, 2, o1, 4);
00510     T *c2_0, *c2_1;
00511     T *d1_2, *d1_3;
00512     T *d1_0, *d1_1;
00513     T *c1_0, *c1_1;
00514     T *ker;
00515     intg c2_m0 = (i2).mod(0), c2_m1 = (i2).mod(1);
00516     intg d1_m2 = (o1).mod(2), d1_m3 = (o1).mod(3);
00517     intg c1_m0 = (i1).mod(0), c1_m1 = (i1).mod(1);
00518     intg d1_m0 = (o1).mod(0), d1_m1 = (o1).mod(1);
00519     intg k,l, lmax = (o1).dim(3), kmax = (o1).dim(2);
00520     intg i,j, imax = (o1).dim(0), jmax = (o1).dim(1);
00521     c1_0 = i1.idx_ptr();
00522     ker = i2.idx_ptr();
00523     d1_0 = o1.idx_ptr();
00524     for (i=0; i<imax; i++) {
00525       d1_1 = d1_0;
00526       c1_1 = c1_0;
00527       for (j=0; j<jmax; j++) {
00528         d1_2 = d1_1;
00529         c2_0 = ker;
00530         for (k=0; k<kmax; k++) {
00531           d1_3 = d1_2;
00532           c2_1 = c2_0;
00533           for (l=0; l<lmax; l++) {
00534             *d1_3 = (*c1_1)*(*c2_1);
00535             d1_3 += d1_m3;
00536             c2_1 += c2_m1;
00537           }
00538           d1_2 += d1_m2;
00539           c2_0 += c2_m0;
00540         }
00541         d1_1 += d1_m1;
00542         c1_1 += c1_m1;
00543       }
00544       d1_0 += d1_m0;
00545       c1_0 += c1_m0;
00546     }
00547   }
00548 
00549   template<class T> void idx_m2extm2acc(Idx<T> &i1, Idx<T> &i2, Idx<T> &o1) {
00550     idx_checkorder3(i1, 2, i2, 2, o1, 4);
00551     T *c2_0, *c2_1;
00552     T *d1_2, *d1_3;
00553     T *d1_0, *d1_1;
00554     T *c1_0, *c1_1;
00555     T *ker;
00556     intg c2_m0 = (i2).mod(0), c2_m1 = (i2).mod(1);
00557     intg d1_m2 = (o1).mod(2), d1_m3 = (o1).mod(3);
00558     intg c1_m0 = (i1).mod(0), c1_m1 = (i1).mod(1);
00559     intg d1_m0 = (o1).mod(0), d1_m1 = (o1).mod(1);
00560     intg k,l, lmax = (o1).dim(3), kmax = (o1).dim(2);
00561     intg i,j, imax = (o1).dim(0), jmax = (o1).dim(1);
00562     c1_0 = i1.idx_ptr();
00563     ker = i2.idx_ptr();
00564     d1_0 = o1.idx_ptr();
00565     for (i=0; i<imax; i++) {
00566       d1_1 = d1_0;
00567       c1_1 = c1_0;
00568       for (j=0; j<jmax; j++) {
00569         d1_2 = d1_1;
00570         c2_0 = ker;
00571         for (k=0; k<kmax; k++) {
00572           d1_3 = d1_2;
00573           c2_1 = c2_0;
00574           for (l=0; l<lmax; l++) {
00575             *d1_3 += (*c1_1)*(*c2_1);
00576             d1_3 += d1_m3;
00577             c2_1 += c2_m1;
00578           }
00579           d1_2 += d1_m2;
00580           c2_0 += c2_m0;
00581         }
00582         d1_1 += d1_m1;
00583         c1_1 += c1_m1;
00584       }
00585       d1_0 += d1_m0;
00586       c1_0 += c1_m0;
00587     }
00588   }

00590   template<class T> void idx_m2squextm2acc(Idx<T> &i1, Idx<T> &i2, Idx<T> &o1) {
00591     idx_checkorder3(i1, 2, i2, 2, o1, 4);
00592     T *c2_0, *c2_1;
00593     T *d1_2, *d1_3;
00594     T *d1_0, *d1_1;
00595     T *c1_0, *c1_1;
00596     T *ker;
00597     intg c2_m0 = (i2).mod(0), c2_m1 = (i2).mod(1);
00598     intg d1_m2 = (o1).mod(2), d1_m3 = (o1).mod(3);
00599     intg c1_m0 = (i1).mod(0), c1_m1 = (i1).mod(1);
00600     intg d1_m0 = (o1).mod(0), d1_m1 = (o1).mod(1);
00601     intg k,l, lmax = (o1).dim(3), kmax = (o1).dim(2);
00602     intg i,j, imax = (o1).dim(0), jmax = (o1).dim(1);
00603     c1_0 = i1.idx_ptr();
00604     ker = i2.idx_ptr();
00605     d1_0 = o1.idx_ptr();
00606     for (i=0; i<imax; i++) {
00607       d1_1 = d1_0;
00608       c1_1 = c1_0;
00609       for (j=0; j<jmax; j++) {
00610         d1_2 = d1_1;
00611         c2_0 = ker;
00612         for (k=0; k<kmax; k++) {
00613           d1_3 = d1_2;
00614           c2_1 = c2_0;
00615           for (l=0; l<lmax; l++) {
00616             *d1_3 += (*c1_1)*(*c2_1)*(*c2_1);
00617             d1_3 += d1_m3;
00618             c2_1 += c2_m1;
00619           }
00620           d1_2 += d1_m2;
00621           c2_0 += c2_m0;
00622         }
00623         d1_1 += d1_m1;
00624         c1_1 += c1_m1;
00625       }
00626       d1_0 += d1_m0;
00627       c1_0 += c1_m0;
00628     }
00629   }

00631   // Fu Jie Huang, May 20, 2008
00632   template<typename T> void idx_m2squdotm2(Idx<T>& i1, Idx<T>& i2, Idx<T>& o) {
00633     idx_checkorder3(i1, 2, i2, 2, o, 0);
00634     idx_checkdim2(i1, 0, i2.dim(0), i1, 1, i2.dim(1));
00635     intg imax = i1.dim(0), jmax = i2.dim(1);
00636     intg c1_m0 = i1.mod(0), c2_m0 = i2.mod(0);
00637     intg c1_m1 = i1.mod(1), c2_m1 = i2.mod(1);
00638 
00639     T *c1_0 = i1.idx_ptr();
00640     T *c2_0 = i2.idx_ptr();
00641     T *d1 = o.idx_ptr();
00642     T *c1, *c2;
00643 
00644     T f = 0;
00645     for(int i=0; i<imax; ++i) {
00646       c1 = c1_0;
00647       c2 = c2_0;
00648       for(int j=0; j<jmax; ++j) {
00649         f += (*c1) * (*c1) * (*c2);   // only difference
00650         c1 += c1_m1;
00651         c2 += c2_m1;
00652       }
00653       c1_0 += c1_m0;
00654       c2_0 += c2_m0;
00655     }
00656     *d1 = f;
00657   }
00658 
00659   // Fu Jie Huang, May 20, 2008
00660   template<typename T> void idx_m2squdotm2acc(Idx<T>& i1, Idx<T>& i2, Idx<T>& o) {
00661     idx_checkorder3(i1, 2, i2, 2, o, 0);
00662     idx_checkdim2(i1, 0, i2.dim(0), i1, 1, i2.dim(1));
00663     intg imax = i1.dim(0), jmax = i2.dim(1);
00664     intg c1_m0 = i1.mod(0), c2_m0 = i2.mod(0);
00665     intg c1_m1 = i1.mod(1), c2_m1 = i2.mod(1);
00666 
00667     T *c1_0 = i1.idx_ptr();
00668     T *c2_0 = i2.idx_ptr();
00669     T *d1 = o.idx_ptr();
00670     T *c1, *c2;
00671 
00672     T f = *d1;          //   only difference: accumulate
00673     for(int i=0; i<imax; ++i) {
00674       c1 = c1_0;
00675       c2 = c2_0;
00676       for(int j=0; j<jmax; ++j) {
00677         f += (*c1) * (*c1) * (*c2);
00678         c1 += c1_m1;
00679         c2 += c2_m1;
00680       }
00681       c1_0 += c1_m0;
00682       c2_0 += c2_m0;
00683     }
00684     *d1 = f;
00685   }

00687   // Fu Jie Huang, May 20, 2008
00688   template<typename T>
00689   void idx_m2oversample(Idx<T>& small, intg nlin, intg ncol, Idx<T>& big)
00690   {
00691     Idx<T> uin  = big.unfold(0, nlin, nlin);
00692     Idx<T> uuin = uin.unfold(1, ncol, ncol);
00693     idx_eloop1(z1, uuin, T) {
00694       idx_eloop1( z2, z1, T) {
00695         idx_copy(small, z2);
00696       }
00697     }
00698   }

00700   template <class T> T idx_max(Idx<T> &m) {
00701     T v = *(m.idx_ptr());
00702     { idx_aloop1(i, m, T) {
00703         if (*i > v) v = *i;
00704       }}
00705     return v;
00706   }
00707 
00708   template <class T> T idx_min(Idx<T> &m) {
00709     T v = *(m.idx_ptr());
00710     { idx_aloop1(i, m, T) {
00711         if (*i < v) v = *i;
00712       }}
00713     return v;
00714   }
00715 
00716   template<class T> intg idx_indexmax(Idx<T> &m) {
00717     intg i = 0, imax = 0;
00718     T v = *(m.idx_ptr());
00719     { idx_aloop1(me, m, T) {
00720         if (*me > v) {
00721           v = *me;
00722           imax = i;
00723         }
00724         i++;
00725       }}
00726     return imax;
00727   }
00728 
00729   template<class T> intg idx_indexmin(Idx<T> &m) {
00730     intg i = 0, imin = 0;
00731     T v = *(m.idx_ptr());
00732     { idx_aloop1(me, m, T) {
00733         if (*me < v) {
00734           v = *me;
00735           imin = i;
00736         }
00737         i++;
00738       }}
00739     return imin;
00740   }
00741 
00742   template<class T1, class T2> void idx_sortdown(Idx<T1> &m, Idx<T2> &p) {
00743     idx_checkorder2(m, 1, p, 1);
00744     if (m.mod(0) != 1) ylerror("idx_sortdown: vector is not contiguous");
00745     if (p.mod(0) != 1) ylerror("idx_sortdown: vector is not contiguous");
00746     intg n = m.dim(0);
00747     intg z = p.dim(0);
00748     if (n != z) ylerror("idx_sortdown: vectors have different sizes");
00749     if (n > 1) {
00750       int l,j,ir,i;
00751       T1 *ra, rra;
00752       T2 *rb, rrb;
00753 
00754       ra = (T1*)m.idx_ptr() -1;
00755       rb = (T2*)p.idx_ptr() -1;
00756 
00757       l = (n >> 1) + 1;
00758       ir = n;
00759       for (;;) {
00760         if (l > 1) {
00761           rra=ra[--l];
00762           rrb=rb[l];
00763         } else {
00764           rra=ra[ir];
00765           rrb=rb[ir];
00766           ra[ir]=ra[1];
00767           rb[ir]=rb[1];
00768           if (--ir == 1) {
00769             ra[1]=rra;
00770             rb[1]=rrb;
00771             return ; } }
00772         i=l;
00773         j=l << 1;
00774         while (j <= ir) {
00775           if (j < ir && ra[j] > ra[j+1]) ++j;
00776           if (rra > ra[j]) {
00777             ra[i]=ra[j];
00778             rb[i]=rb[j];
00779             j += (i=j);
00780           } else j=ir+1; }
00781         ra[i]=rra;
00782         rb[i]=rrb;
00783       }
00784     }
00785   }
00786 
00787   template<class T> T idx_sqrdist(Idx<T> &i1, Idx<T> &i2) {
00788     idx_checknelems2_all(i1, i2);
00789     T z = 0;
00790     T tmp;
00791     { idx_aloop2(pi1, i1, T, pi2, i2, T) {
00792         tmp = *pi1 - *pi2;
00793         z += tmp * tmp;
00794       }
00795     }
00796     return z;
00797   }
00798 
00799   template<class T> void idx_sqrdist(Idx<T> &i1, Idx<T> &i2, Idx<T> &out) {
00800     idx_checknelems2_all(i1, i2);
00801     if (out.order() != 0) ylerror("idx_sqrdist: expecting an idx of order 0");
00802     out.set(idx_sqrdist(i1, i2));
00803   }
00804 
00805   template <class T> void idx_exp(Idx<T> &m) {
00806     idx_aloop1(i, m, T) {
00807       *i = exp(*i);
00808     };
00809   }

00813      if (o1.order() != 0) ylerror("Not an Idx0");
00814      return o1.set(idx_dot(i1, i2));

00817 
00818   template<class T> void idx_dotacc(Idx<T> &i1, Idx<T> &i2, Idx<T> &o) {
00819     if (o.order() != 0) ylerror("Not an Idx0");
00820     o.set(o.get() + idx_dot(i1, i2));
00821   }
00822 
00823   template<class T> void idx_clip(Idx<T> &i1, T m, Idx<T> &o1) {
00824     idx_checknelems2_all(i1, o1);
00825     { idx_aloop2(i, i1, T, o, o1, T) {
00826         *o = std::max(m, *i);
00827       }}
00828   }

00830   template<class T> void idx_2dconvol(Idx<T> &in, Idx<T> &kernel, Idx<T> &out) {
00831     idx_checkorder3(in, 2, kernel, 2, out, 2);
00832     Idx<T> uin(in.unfold(0, kernel.dim(0), 1));
00833     uin = uin.unfold(1, kernel.dim(1), 1);
00834     idx_m4dotm2(uin, kernel, out);
00835   }
